subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Devils continued their rise from the Eastern Conference cellar, winning for the sixth time in a row and for the 14th time in their last 17 games by beating the Rangers at the Prudential Center.
snippet: The Devils continued their rise from the Eastern Conference cellar, winning for the sixth time in a row and for the 14th time in their last 17 games by beating the Rangers at the Prudential Center.
